definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound
lit. if you tap a half-empty bottle it makes a sound (idiom)/fig. empty vessels make the most noise/one who has a little knowledge likes to show off, but one who is truly knowledgeable is modest
pinyin: ban4 ping2 shui3 xiang3 ding1 dang1

sentences.english: It's a tradition to sing "Jingle Bells" at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節唱《鈴兒響叮噹》是一種傳統。

sentences.english: What is your favorite Christmas song?
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的是《鈴兒響叮噹》。

sentences.english: It's a tradition to sing "Jingle Bells" on Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節唱“鈴兒響叮噹”是一種傳統。

definition: lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
